name: SEARCH ALL - SPIDERS
description:
SEARCH ALL - SPIDERS

is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the spiders in a large location. Spiders will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places. The whole game location looks lively because of the animation elements. Find all the spiders! Don't let them go unnoticed :)

Key Features:
- Animation elements on location;
- 100 spiders to find;
- Pleasant soundtrack;
- The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result;
- Implemented hints! If you find it difficult to find an item, use the hint!
